gate.iaaplugin

Class IaaCalculation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.iaaplugin.IaaCalculation

  • public class IaaCalculation
extends Object
    Compute the IAA(inter-annotator agreements), including the observed agreement, category specific agreeement, several variants of Kappa such as Cohen's Kappa, and the F-measures between the annotators (see the GATE user Guide for detailed explanations about those measures).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The name of annotators.

      Array of annotation sets, first dimension is for document, and second dimension is for annotator.

      The overall contingency table.

      The contingency table for each pair of annotator.

      The overall F-measure.

      Fmeaures for each pair of annotator and over all labels.

      Fmeaures for each pair of annotator and each label.
